tweet.title: Well back in the land of communication (& the Twitterverse) after 3 weeks kayaking down the Grand Canyon. Rattlesnakes, rapids & riotous fun
While filming #canyon will have no signal until I emerge out the other end. #twittersilence #newsblackout . Been nice knowing u all *sniff*
Am off 2day 4 the journey of a lifetime to the USA 2 kayak the Grand Canyon with the #BBC. I've got the wildlife ticket in the boat #canyon
Dear tweetsters, thanks so much for your lovely comment re: peregrines on #theoneshow last night. It was a privilege 2 make such a fab piece
#theoneshow alert! Terrific piece going out on tonight's prog about peregrine falcons. Wait till u see it whack me in the back of the head!
Should have said the fabulously talented & gorgeous @KeeleyDonovan co-presents the Urban Jungle prog tonight as well! #Sky957 #naughtyboy
Stop Press! Urban Jungle is out tonight on BBC1 at 7pm. I present the Look North Prog for Yorks & Lincs on Sky 957 & it's a cracking prog!
Bottlenose dolphin overload at Cardigan Bay with @cbmwc & @sperrywink for #theoneshow http://t.co/rNNEnpfPCO
Am off on whitewater rafting practice today for the BEEB. Should be a fun, exhausting & bruising experience.
This is what a little finger looks like after its been chewed by an habituated stoat. #feistywildlife http://t.co/Tdhq4ZcvSx
Entranced & charmed by stoats 2day for #theoneshow with @hannahvisiontv & Martin H-Smith. My new favourite animal - even tho I got bitten!
My Wiki article has been amended 2 include a section on my shopping habits, unless they're confusing me with "a generic bald man"... weird!
There can be few more charming zoo babies than a rhino calf. Thanks 2 @ChesterZoo_No1 4 a terrific day! http://t.co/5fT4vLC9Rj
8 botanical ticks at @Ranscombe_Farm with @Love_plants 4 #theoneshow 2day. Arable weeds are a curious & enigmatic group needing our support
Poppies abound at @Ranscombe_Farm for #theoneshow it's blue sky above & blood red below http://t.co/6WgZPjMKRJ
